name: Demon Speakeasy

◆Story◆
With the newfound peace between humans and demons, you've decided to open a bar with your lieutenants: Dora the Dragon Princess and Tio the Fox.
The doors open at night to welcome all sorts of customers. Rub shoulders with the Royal Guard, possessed archers, ancient goddesses, slutty sorceresses, vampire detectives, mermaids, and more!
Take their orders, listen to their stories and try to find the right drink for everyone.
Watch out for those who want to destroy your bar... or get into your pants.
◆Gameplay◆
As the charming demon bartender, you'll have to make drinks based on your customers' requests. Earn tips based on customer satisfaction!
Alternatively, you can also try getting them really drunk. Who knows what'll happen?
◆Features◆
◇30 beautiful H-CG scenes tailored for your pleasure.
◇One-handed play to free up that other hand!
◇Live out your bartender dreams with our immersive cocktail mixing minigame!
◇Choose from eleven beautiful tracks by Pykamia to play as you schmooze and booze up your guests.
◇An ensemble cast of 15 adorable characters just waiting for you to mix the right drink for them!
